attributes.action: SUPPORT PETITION;To Change laws that PROTECT PAEDOPHILES A Campaign To Amend The 2003 justice Bill
attributes.additional_details: we want a amendment in the law stating that if the Offender admits grooming/ Abuse of trust or sexually assaulting the victim before 2003, and the victim comes forward after 2003 then the police and CPS can enact any law that is relevant to the individual case from the 2003 criminal Justice bill
